attributes.action: Stop yellow lines in London borough of Richmond upon Thames
attributes.additional_details: Because it is another cash cow to implement residents parking permits and pay and display when there isn’t any need as there drastically are more spaces than cars!
attributes.background: Stopping council in implementing double yellow lines in their belief of safety when there isn’t any evidence!

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
